name: Steel Flanged Mace
description: A mace forged to perfection with flanged edges, designed to crush armor, bone and soul.
tooltip: Bludgeon (60%): Deals 2-8 + 5 * STR bonus bludgeoning damage.
Crush (25%): Deals 2-8 + 5 * STR bonus bludgeoning damage. This attack has a +5% critical chance.
Skull Crush (15%): Deals 2-10 + 5 * STR bonus bludgeoning damage. This attack has a +10% critical chance and +5 accuracy.
